trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Minneapolis
There were no other sightings in Minneapolis on or around March 15th 1990
Summary: lime green cigar traveling east to west low on the horizon
divs: Sighting DetailsMinneapolis. Early spring, 1990. I was deep sleeping like a log when I just bolted upright for no apparent reason as if I had heard a really loud noise but there wasn't one. and for some reason was called to look out the window so I did but there wasn't anything there. I kept staring, then the bright green cigar shape came out of the east and cruised across the horizon at a steady pace slowly and silently and then disappeared into the trees to the west. I knew it was a ufo immediately. i felt i was called to see it. I had seen one about 10 years earlier near Barnum Minnesota do short bursts of speed and a zig zag and then bolt out of the sky at a sharp angle. I never felt scared. I woke my girlfriend up and I think she may have seen the last glow of it through the trees.
